title: AI-focused TCS sees its staffers clocking more learning hours
description: This comes as TCS doubled its generative AI projects pipeline to $900 mn. Interestingly, senior female employees have been putting in more hours to learn than their male counterparts for the last four years, as per the annual report.
content: In the process of building one of the largest AI-ready workforces in the world, TCS saw its average learning hours per employee increase to 87.1 hours in FY24 from 82.4 hours in FY23.
